mapper.select: select minfonum, mpicname, mfilename, mtitle, msname, mgrade, metcinfo from musict order by minfonum desc

select my.USERID userid, m.MTITLE mtitle, m.MSNAME msname, my.MINFONUM minfonum, m.MFILENAME mfilename from mymusict my inner join musict m on my.MINFONUM=m.MINFONUM where my.USERID=#{userid} order by myordernum desc
